title: How soon do you think it will be before the majority of cell phone users in the United States use a 5G network? - Quora
tags: Politics of the United States of America

response.answer_text: Given the pace of 3G and 4G deployments, likely 2–4 years for Urban/Suburban, 4–6 years for Rural areas. Unless you go the AT&T route and just re-label 4G as 5Ge. :) The reality is that low band 5G is ultimately the same to the majority of consumers, so if you ask when will US customers have 5G running on mmWave in the US, that is likely never. You just can’t afford that many tower sites to push mmWave to all of the US, given the terrain, clutter and other various challenges.
